Sentencas: One of the key challenges in developing high-performance electrochemical energy devices is the slow kinetics of the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR).
Titulo: Understanding the influence of strain-modified oxygen vacancies and surface chemistry on the oxygen reduction reaction of epitaxial La0.8Sr0.2CoO3-δ thin films

Sentencas: Implementing epitaxial strain induced by a lattice mismatch between a film and a substrate has shown great potential for enhancing the ORR by increasing the concentration of oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Understanding the influence of strain-modified oxygen vacancies and surface chemistry on the oxygen reduction reaction of epitaxial La0.8Sr0.2CoO3-δ thin films

Sentencas: However, strain also influences the surface chemistry which also impacts the ORR.
Titulo: Understanding the influence of strain-modified oxygen vacancies and surface chemistry on the oxygen reduction reaction of epitaxial La0.8Sr0.2CoO3-δ thin films

Sentencas: Here, we show the role of strain in concurrent changes of oxygen vacancies and surface chemistry, which in turn significantly influence the ORR activity by employing epitaxial La0.8Sr0.2Co3-delta (LSC) thin films with three different strain states.
Titulo: Understanding the influence of strain-modified oxygen vacancies and surface chemistry on the oxygen reduction reaction of epitaxial La0.8Sr0.2CoO3-δ thin films

Sentencas: Tensile strained LSC films dramatically enhanced ORR activity up to two orders of magnitude compared to compressively strained LSC films.
Titulo: Understanding the influence of strain-modified oxygen vacancies and surface chemistry on the oxygen reduction reaction of epitaxial La0.8Sr0.2CoO3-δ thin films

Sentencas: Among the tensile strained films, moderately tensile strained LSC films show the highest ORR activity, which is attributed to both increased concentration of oxygen vacancies and suppressed Sr segregation.
Titulo: Understanding the influence of strain-modified oxygen vacancies and surface chemistry on the oxygen reduction reaction of epitaxial La0.8Sr0.2CoO3-δ thin films

Sentencas: Our study provides a new design strategy to enhance the ORR activity by controlling the strain state to tune the Sr segregation, oxygen vacancies, and oxygen surface exchange kinetics.
Titulo: Understanding the influence of strain-modified oxygen vacancies and surface chemistry on the oxygen reduction reaction of epitaxial La0.8Sr0.2CoO3-δ thin films
